text: John Burnett (born 24 June 1939) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:People from Market Rasen Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people
title: John Burnett (footballer)
